casebody.data:
Angela OWENS, Appellant, v. ALLTEL COMMUNICATIONS, INC., Appellee. No. 07-2809. United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit. Submitted: Sept. 5, 2008. Filed: Sept. 23, 2008. John Winfred Walker Sr., John W. Walker, P.C., Little Rock, AR, for Appellant. Regina Haralson, Kaplan & Brewer, Philip E. Kaplan, Williams & Anderson, Little Rock, AR, for Appellee.

Before MURPHY, BYE, and BENTON, Circuit Judges.

[UNPUBLISHED]

PER CURIAM.

Angela Owens appeals the district court’s1 adverse grant of summary judgment in her Title VII discrimination action. After reviewing the record de novo, viewing the evidence and all reasonable inferences from it in a light most favorable to Owens, see Jacob-Mua v. Veneman, 289 F.3d 517, 520 (8th Cir.2002) (standard of review), we conclude summary judgment *431was proper. Accordingly, we affirm. See 8th Cir. R. 47B.

. The Honorable James M. Moody, United States District Judge for the Eastern District of Arkansas.
